column2: title=Christie's The Albin Schram Collection of Autograph Letters 3 July 2007

column1: '''''Christie's The Albin Schram Collection of Autograph Letters''''' is an auction catalogue which includes extracts (lot 187, p.115) from a two page letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to [[Pauline Baynes]] (see ''[[Letter to Pauline Baynes]]''). The second page of the letter is reproduced in a photograph.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
